description: Display users' disk space usage and allocated limits. More information: https://manned.org/quota.

useCases.description: Show disk quotas in human-readable units for the current user:
Verbose output (also display quotas on filesystems where no storage is allocated):
Quiet output (only display quotas on filesystems where usage is over quota):
Print quotas for the groups of which the current user is a member:
Show disk quotas for another user:
